## üëã Hi I'm Jonatan Gabriel Bortolon

I'm studing **Computer Science** at Instituto Federal de Ci√™ncia e Tecnologia de Sul de Minas Gerais (IFSULDEMINAS) campus Passos, in Brazil.\
Since I was a kid I'm fascinated with technology, in specific computers, after I reach a certain experience in area I'm became fascinated with all subareas of technology, so I love to learn everything about technologies.\
My experience with works/personal project go from basics websites to machine learning projects.\
My favorite stack is NodeJS, but not limited with that, I'm already worked with Laravel, Unity3D, Unreal Engine, ReactJS, NextJS, AdonisJS and many others and I'm used to the many concepts like data structure, memory allocation, APIs, MVC, object oriented, algorithm complexity and more.
